name: The New Girl
description:
Yoshida Kaito, the most popular guy in his school, slowly became more boring with all of the people around him over the years. None of the guys ever been sincerely interested in his friendship. None of the girls who had ever confessed to hime could not take his interest even in the slightest. Also the ever-present younger brother seems to not being able to keep his long nose out of Kaito's business... Nothing new has been going on for at least a couple of years, really...

However in the beginning of this year something went different. Shibata Megumi, the girl who has just transferred to Kaito's school, somehow took the attention of everybody in the school, including Kaito himself.

Will Kaito be able to overcome all the struggles on the way to charming the new girl? Or someone another will do that even before he could have his chance? May both their popularity and good-looks be enough to make them like each other? Or those would be just something else to deal with on their way to the happines?


"The New Girl" is a romantic visual novel featuring a school-life related story. Make your own choices, keep up with all the adventures and every day routines which are going on in Kaito's life, and enjoy the story you are creating yourself!Features:
  • nice background sounds
  • lot's of main & additional characters
  • Steam achievements
